title: 23-014 WASTEWATER TREATMENT PLANT (WWTP) GENERATOR INSTALLATION & ELECTRICAL IMPROVEMENTS - ITB
description: This project will replace the two existing stand-alone generators with four generators connected in parallel. The generators, generator platform, and generator remote-mounted annunciators will be provided by the CITY. It is the City’s Intent to Invite the Awarded Firms from RFQ 23-006 to submit a Bid in response to this Invitation To Bid. A site visit to the Wastewater Plant located at 1400 3rd Avenue North will take place directly after the Mandatory Pre-Bid. Prospective Bidders are strongly encouraged to attend since the Wastewater Plant is a fenced/secured area and this will be their only opportunity to access it.

title: 23-021 Lab Testing Services - RFP
description: The City of Naples desires to enter into a contractual relationship with vendors capable of providing TNI (The NELAC Institute) certified lab testing services for soil, potable and non-potable matrices. It is the City’s intent to award to multiple vendors and to designate vendors in terms of primary service providers and standby service providers.

title: 23-018 OYSTER REEF RESTORATION PROJECT SITE 2 - RFP
description: The City of Naples is soliciting proposals to construct ten oyster reefs in Naples Bay, Florida. Contractors and/or consulting firms qualified and experienced in marine engineering, water resources, and environmental restoration will be considered for award of this Request for Proposals (RFP).
